name: Facebook_AppClear
description: 清除facebook遊戲周圍非必要的東西
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://apps.facebook.com/"),
domain("apps.facebook.com"),
domain("happyelements.com"),
domain("playfish.com"),
domain("farmville.com"),
domain("angrybirds-facebook.appspot.com"),
domain("king.com"),
url-prefix(javascript:){

#fm_wrap,
#gip_flash_container,
#iframe_canvas{
margin:0!important;
top:0px!important;
width:100%!important;
height:800px!important;
}

/*king*/
#topBanner,
#bottomBanner,
#links,

/*angrybirds*/
#topExtraContent,

/*farmville*/
#zbar,
#snapi_zbar,
#promoBarIframe,
#progress_bar_wrapper,
#progress_bar2,
.connect_button_slider,
.connect_widget_vertical_center connect_widget_button_cell,
.gcBorder,
.noticebox,
.subheader,
.header,
.footer,
.center,
.padding_content,
.featureBox,
.main_gift_cont,
.feed_tabs,
.toggle_tabs,
.footerPromo,
.gift_page_header,
.snapi,

/*playfish*/
.header_container,
.pf-cross-promos-header,
.pf-cross-promos-footer,
.pf-cross-promos,
.pf-console-footer,
.likeButton iframe,
#bank,
#addFanIFrame,

/*happyelements*/
.gip_pop_othergames_layer,
.fm_top,
.fm_grid,
#fm_new_proms,
#fm_ad_01,
#fm_ad_01_flash,
#fm_ad_02,
#fm_help,
#app215779025017_banner_top,
#app215779025017_twofishes_head,

#contentCurve,
#fbDockChat,
#dropmenu_container,
#ugzje3_16,
#uha666_16,
#fbDockWrapper fixed_always fbDockWrapperRight,
#gb_muffin_area, .fbEmuEgoUnit, .fbEmuEgoUnitFirst,
#home_sponsor_nile,
#leftColContainer,
#pageFooter,
#pageHead,
#pagelet_canvas_footer_content,
#pagelet_netego_ads,
#pagelet_presence,
#post_form_id,
#rightCol,
#pagelet_bluebar,
.adcolumn,
.btn_rmChat,
.emu_ad,
.emu_sponsor,
.fbDock clearfix,
.feed_item.clearfix.ad_capsule.has_body,
.feed_item.clearfix.social_ad.social_ad_no_full_clickable,
.fixedAux,
.hidden_elem,
.house_sponsor,
.sidebar_item.sponsor,
.tf_m clearfix,
.UICompatibilityFrame_SidebarAds,
.UIConnectWithFriends.UIHomeBox,
.UIHotStory.UIStory.house_sponsor,
.UIHotStory_First.UIHotStory.UIStory.house_sponsor,
.UIStandardFrame_Container,
.UIStandardFrame_Content,
.UIStandardFrame_SidebarAds,
.UIWashFrame_SidebarAds,
.xsell_bar clearfix{
display:none!important;
padding-left:0!important;
position:fixed!important;
left:-1000px!important;
top:-1000px!important;
text-decoration:none!important;
background:transparent!important;
border:0!important;
opacity:0!important;
height:0!important;
margin:0!important;
overflow:hidden!important;
width:0!important;
height:0!important;
}
}
